tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

as.description: Element type to render as. Will be set to `<a>` if href is provided.

variant.description: The style variant of the item

role.description: The ARIA role of the element

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

elements.name: signature
elements.raw:
{
  children?: Renderable
  /**
   * Element type to render as. Will be set to `<a>` if href is provided.
   */
  as?: AsElementType
  /**
   * The style variant of the item
   */
  variant?:
    | 'default'
    | 'highlighted'
    | 'selected'
    | 'disabled'
    | 'highlighted-disabled'
    | 'selected-highlighted'
  /**
   * The ARIA role of the element
   */
  role?: string
}

The ARIA role of the element

renderAfterLabel.description:
Content to render after the label
(if you pass a function, it has the `props` as its parameter)

beforeLabelContentVAlign.description: Sets the vAlign of renderBeforeLabel content

afterLabelContentVAlign.description: Sets the vAlign of renderAfterLabel content

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| ClassType, ClassicComponentClass

> | ComponentClass | ReactNode | ((data: P) => ReactNode | Element) | (() => ReactNode | Element) | Element

descriptionRole.description: The ARIA role of the description element

href.description: Providing href will render the option as `<a>`.

voiceoverRoleBugWorkaround.description: Sometimes VoiceOver doesn't announce the role of the highlighted item. This prop forces the role to be on the outer element and should only be used when such an issue arises.

elementRef.description: provides a reference to the underlying html root element

isSelected.description: Whether or not this option is selected
